pageContext.claim: “I'm going to do a capital gains tax cut to 15 percent in second term. We're going to get it down to 15 percent. It’s at 21. We'll get that down to 15 percent and I'll get that done easily.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump slightly conflates tax rates. The corporate tax rate is 21 percent. Capital Gains taxes for individuals vary based on their tax status ranging from 0 to 20 percent. Add in state tax on long term capital gains and that rate can reach 37.1 percent, according to the Tax Foundation.
